page.title: 05Leisure in Woodham Ferrers 2
page.content: Most homes have a daily paper (av. 18p) delivered by local teenager giving national and foriegn news in tabloid form. Weekly and evening papers give local news. Sunday newspapers include magazines and special features as well as national and foreign news. Magazines are aimed at women, special interests, hobbies etc. Comics are age graded some are quite modern others have been around for 20 or 30 years. Some of the papers taken include; Daily Telegraph, Daily Mirror, Daily Mail, Sun, Daily Express, Daily Star, The Times, East Anglian Daily Times. Local weekly papers are Woodham Wickford Chronicle, Maldon and Burnham Standard. Evening papers (local) Evening Echo, Evening Gazette, Standard Recorder (free). Sunday papers - Sunday Mirror, Express, Times and Mail on Sunday.
